dialogue.string: 1�Greetings, traveler. I am a resistance officer whose charge is the procurement of cruor.If you would be willing to part with any cruor you possess, I will issue you with helpful items in return.

1�What will you do? (Cruor balance: 
�)Nothing.Learn about cruor.Exchange for items.Exchange for temporary items.Exchange for key items.Exchange for enhancement effects.Dispose of abyssite.
1�Cruor is a naturally occurring mineral found as deposits on creatures native to Abyssea.
1�Known by some as ??blood gold,?? these red granules are highly prized and see use as both energy source and construction material.
1�It would be no exaggeration to say that cruor is the lifeblood of the resistance effort.As a matter of fact, the bulk of items I have in stock are cruor-based.
1�Chief among them being ??ancient abyssite,?? a highly concentrated, doubly valuable form of the stone boasting diverse benefits.
1�Ancient abyssite has been observed to improve the fortunes and vitality of their possessors, not unlike a good luck talisman.

1�The most popular varieties offer extended visitant status time, accelerated growth, and myriad enhancement effects.Some are even said to improve luck, but such benefits can be troublesome to measure.
1�I am limited in the types of ancient abyssite I can issue. The opportunity to acquire rarer varieties, however, will surely visit you during your time in Abyssea.
1�Besides the issuance of items, I am also authorized to imbue you with enhancement effects.

1�Trade for how many? (Cruor balance: 
�)None for now.

1�This ancient abyssite helps to stabilize your existential phase, allowing you to remain in Abyssea for longer durations.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with the ground beneath you, allowing you to obtain more 5????.
1�This ancient abyssite facilitates energy release, making travel through Veridical Confluxes possible with fewer cruor.
1�This ancient abyssite mitigates mechanical wear, reducing the cool-off duration when using martellos.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with treasure, increasing your likelihood of finding spoils after battle.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with treasure, increasing your likelihood of encountering blue pyxides.
1�This ancient abyssite heightens your senses, allowing you to unlock treasure chests with greater ease.
1�This ancient abyssite imbues your soul with great strength, allowing you to infuse an additional atma for each piece possessed.
1�This is a map of Abyssea - La Theine. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Konschtat. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Tahrongi. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Attohwa. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Misareaux. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Vunkerl. Don't leave home without it!

1�Certain monsters in Abyssea loath contact with people, concealing themselves from detection. Only with this abyssite will you be able to uncloak and confront them. Go into a crouch with it in your possession, and the way will be revealed to you.
1�Trade for 6?????Yes.No.

1� �[/?????C?Y/?v???e?X/?V?F??/???W?F?l/???t???V??/HP?A?b?v/MP?A?b?v/STR??DEX?A?b?v/VIT??AGI?A?b?v/INT??MND??CHR?A?b?v/??????]?????????????????HTrade for  �[/Reraise/Protect/Shell/Regen/Refresh/HP boost/MP boost/STR-DEX boost/VIT-AGI boost/INT-MND-CHR boost/all enhancements]?Yes.No.
1�You do not have enough cruor.
1�Well met, wayfarer. I am an Atma Infusionist, and from my title I trust you can glean my field of expertise.Those who possess 6???? may come to me to have atma infused.
1�How might I serve you?You may not.Tell me about atma.Infuse me with atma.Examine infused atma.Purge atma.Reinfuse previous atma set.Select from recent history.

1�Atma is most accurately described as the crystalline agglomeration of an Abyssean creature's soul.Through painstaking research, we infusionists have discovered a way to imbue ordinary people such as yourself with its power.
1�Infusion makes possible the augmentation of individuals, granting them powers particular to the creature from which the atma is sourced.
1�The infusion process requires three objects: an atma, 6????, and cruor.
1�?6???? is a rare variety of ancient abyssite that can only be procured with great difficulty.And it won't please you to know that atma is rarer still.
1�For only the most savage creatures, you see, are known to yield atma.And if you thought that weren't trial enough, only by employing special combat strategies will atma be yours to own.
1�Atma-yielding monsters are known to have vulnerabilities that, if exploited, may result in a swift end to the confrontation.
1�Strike at a foe's weakness, and it will drop different spoils, often more valuable than usual. Among them you may find atma.
1�The vulnerabilities can broadly be divided into three categories: magic attacks, physical-based weapon skills, and magic-based weapon skills.
1�For instance, there are monsters known to be weak against magic-based weapon skills.Inflicting such damage upon them will impair their movement, and you may consequently be rewarded with atma.

1�All living creatures, however, possess the capacity to adapt, and vulnerabilities have been observed to change.Be wary if you wish not to discover to your sorrow that a once-foolproof strategy no longer applies.
1�Besting such fell creatures is in itself a harrowing task, and becomes even more so if procuring atma is your objective.
1�But should fortune smile upon you and you find yourself in possession of atma, bring it here.I will see that it serves you well.

1�

1�You have already been infused with that atma.

1�You cannot be infused with more than 
� atma at any given time.Please have an existing atma purged if you wish to replace it with another.
1�Purge which atma?None for now.?3????.?3????.?3????.Purge all.

1�It would seem you've already been infused with that atma configuration.Perhaps you meant to ask me to infuse some new atma instead?

1�You do not have enough cruor.
?.�An unseen force is drawing you towards the maw.

1�Warp to  �[Dummy/the La Theine Plateau/the Konschtat Highlands/the Tahrongi Canyon/the Buburimu Peninsula/the Valkurm Dunes/the Jugner Forest/South Gustaberg/North Gustaberg/Xarcabard/Qufim Island]?Proceed.Not yet.
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Wyrm God(pt.1).The Wyrm God(pt.2).The Wyrm God(pt.3).Meanwhile, Back on Abyssea.A Moonlight Requite.
1�What will you say?P-Prishe?What's a girl like you...
1�What do you say?Snap out of it, Prishe!Say nothing and continue on.
1�What do you say?You just leave it to me!Smile in response.
1�  flashes ?[his/her] pearly whites at Prish
1�So all hell broke loose on Abyssea...
1�There's something I need to say.The wretched state of the world--it's...it's all our fault.
1�I bet you've already figured it out.
1�We went up against Promathia,  .We took on the Twilight God...but we couldn't finish the job.
1�Why, you're every ilm the gutsy adventurer the   I knew was!Always setting the bar so high, you make me look bad, you know?
1�At any rate, it's good to know that   will always be  , no matter what dimension ?[he/she] hails from.
1�I do notice one difference, though.The oodles and oodles of power you emanate--it seems to be something inherent to folk of your world.
1�I hate to admit it, but it's obvious I'll just end up cramping your style if I tag along.1�;???????????????
???Therefore, I'm going to sit this one out.My world, Abyssea--it's all in your hands now,  .
1�Hehehe, ever the reliable adventurer, I see.
e.�Ah, how many times have I seen that doltish grin of yours? Sure brings back memories.
1�Now, let me be dead serious for a moment,  .
1�You're bursting at the seams with power that people of Abyssea can only dream of, this is true.
1�In absorbing our friend Selh'teus into His being, the Twilight God has evolved and taken on a fearsome new form: terror and dread made flesh.
1�He looks more like a wyrm now, but one that's bigger, badder, and uglier than anything you've ever seen.
1�But hey, don't let these little details unnerve you.
1�When you square off against this souped-up Promathia, the foremost thing to keep in mind is to be yourself.That's right,  . Be your bloodthirsty, ruthless self.
1�Ready yourself as best you can, because if even the extra-dimensional version of you can't come out on top, then--the Goddess forbid--Abyssea truly is screwed.
1�I always knew you could do it, but still, I was on pins and needles the whole time. I'd already lost you once before, after all.

1�It's just as I feared, though. Defeating a god won't turn back time--won't undo all the damage in the blink of an eye.Those who were taken won't be coming back, while those who remain will have to rebuild their world the old-fashioned way.
1�Do you notice?
1�Promathia's gone, but neither can I hear the voice of the Goddess.I'm sure she's grieving in silence even as we speak.
1�Things may never be the same again, but I still mean to put to good use the long life I've been given.I'm going to stay here and keep watch over the world, see where it's headed.
1�You'd have to go a long way to find a better view than here. Don't you think,  ?
1�If this is the moon we're standing on, then that thing a hojillion malms away must be Abyssea.
1�This place, though, holds special meaning for me. After all, it's where I fought my last battle beside my friends.
1�And that's why I have to stay.
1�Rough days are still ahead for Abyssea, and it pains me that I won't be around to help out.
1�But with you on the job, I know I've got nothing to worry about.
1�When you get back, I want you to deliver a message to the cardinal.Tell her that I'm alive, and in strapping shape as always.
1�Tell her also...that I'm sorry.
1�Folk would call me improper to send a god-slayer as my errand ?[boy/girl].But as you can see, there's no one else around I can ask to do this favor.
1�Hey! If it isn't the other  !Did you forget something when you left?
1�Or perhaps--dare I hope--you came all this way to see little old me? Hmmm?
1�Aaah, poor Prishe, never a moment to herself! But such is the price of popularity!
1�But never mind that. It's truly good to see you again,  .
1�And it appears you've already delivered my message to the cardinal.
1�When I saw you coming,  , my heart skipped a beat.I thought it'd leap out of my chest for the joy, no exaggeration!
1�All right?
1�It's a promise,  ! Don't even think of breaking it!
1�Now, look here. As a show of gratitude, I'm going to give you a present.
1�It's 6????, something that once belonged to the you of Abyssea.
1�?[He/She] would have wanted you to have it,  .
1�Take good care of it as if it were me, you hear?
1�Now, let me be dead serious for a moment,  .
1�You're bursting at the seams with power that people of Abyssea can only dream of, this is true.
1�However, the enemy that awaits beyond isn't the run-of-the-mill man-god you might be expecting.
1�In absorbing our friend Selh'teus into His being, the Twilight God has evolved and taken on a fearsome new form: terror and dread made flesh.
1�He looks more like a wyrm now, but one that's bigger, badder, and uglier than anything you've ever seen.
1�But hey, don't let these little details unnerve you.
1�When you square off against this souped-up Promathia, the foremost thing to keep in mind is to be yourself.That's right,  . Be your bloodthirsty, ruthless self.
1�Ready yourself as best you can, because if even the extra-dimensional version of you can't come out on top, then--the Goddess forbid--Abyssea truly is screwed.
1�Rough days are still ahead for Abyssea, and it pains me that I won't be around to help out.
1�But with you on the job, I know I've got nothing to worry about.
1�When you get back, I want you to deliver a message to the cardinal.Tell her that I'm alive, and in strapping shape as always.
1�Tell her also...that I'm sorry.
1�Folk would call me improper to send a god-slayer as my errand ?[boy/girl].But as you can see, there's no one else around I can ask to do this favor.
1�We may be of different worlds, but ours is a friendship of dimension transcending!Go well,  , and thank you. I hope it won't be long before we meet again.
1�I've never had so much free time in my life. It's all I can do to find things to occupy myself.Perhaps I'll go for a stroll along the surface of the moon. Moonlighting--heheh, you get it?
1�No? Damn it, I really am losing my edge...
